original_text: And Ishbi-benob, one of the descendants of the giants, whose spear weighed three hundred shekels of bronze, and who was armed with a new sword, thought to kill David.
korean_text: 거인족의 아들 중에 무게가 삼백 세겔 되는 놋 창을 들고 새 칼을 찬 이스비브놉이 다윗을 죽이려 하므로

sentences.original_text: one of the descendants of the giants
whose spear weighed three hundred shekels of bronze
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 창은 놋 삼백 세겔의 무게를 가졌는데

sentences.original_text: and who was armed with a new sword
